entry.title: A Payment Point Feature Family (MultiSig, DLC, Escrow, ...)
entry.summary: ZmnSCPxj suggests contributing to the scriptless scripts repo at https://github.com/ElementsProject/scriptless-scripts to standardize terminology and notation for ideas in the scriptless space. ZmnSCPxj explains a potential scheme for general disjunctive normal forms using ANDs and ORs policy. They also discuss the case of a DLC oracle and how an aggregating oracle could be used to ensure accuracy. ZmnSCPxj proposes two different ways to group parallel attempts into sub-payments for atomic value transfer and discusses their implications. Finally, they mention the possibility of enabling atomic payments with known paths through stuckless and AMP.
